sentences.en: And the Fiat next to the Volkswagen?
sentences.cn: 大众旁边的菲亚特(fiat)怎么样?

sentences.en: Early stone press mostly hand - driven Fiat ship structures , fully manual operation.
sentences.cn: 早期的石印机不小多是手摇式木架布局, 合座靠手工不不安息.

sentences.en: Fiat has been one of the greatest casualties of the recession.
sentences.cn: 菲亚特一直是经济萧条中损失最惨重的公司之一。

sentences.en: Fiat has linked up with Chrysler and Volkswagen has formed an alliance with Suzuki.
sentences.cn: 菲亚特(Fiat)与克莱斯勒(Chrysler)结盟,大众(Volkswagen)与铃木(Suzuki)缔约.

sentences.en: Fiat is Italy's largest industrial conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 菲亚特是意大利最大的产业集团。

sentences.en: He has tried to impose solutions to the country's problems by fiat.
sentences.cn: 他试图下令强行解决该国的问题。

sentences.en: He jammed into his Fiat X 19 two - seater.
sentences.cn: 他挤进菲亚特X19型双座轿车里.

sentences.en: His substantial frame jammed into his Fiat X 19 two - seater.
sentences.cn: 他魁梧的身躯挤进菲亚特X19型双座轿车里.

sentences.en: My home town's been bombed fiat and my people have gone to Pengpu.
sentences.cn: 我家里让炮火打得稀烂,家里人都逃到蚌埠去了.

sentences.en: That new Fiat is a fast little number.
sentences.cn: 那辆新的菲亚特是速度很快的汽车.

sentences.en: The came back and bought furniture for her fiat.
sentences.cn: 他们度完蜜月回来后,买了家具装饰她的公寓.

sentences.en: The opening of a market stall is governed by municipal fiat.
sentences.cn: 开设市场摊位受市政法令管制.

sentences.en: The principle sanctioned by fiat what was evidently empirically correct but not yet logically established.
sentences.cn: 这个原理用命令来批准,经验上显然正确但未在逻辑上建立.

sentences.en: There are two forms of money : commodity money and fiat money.
sentences.cn: 货币主要有两种形式: 商品货币和纸币.

sentences.en: While talking, he changed freeway lanes , maneuvering the Fiat with one hand.
sentences.cn: 他一边讲话, 一边用一只手开着菲亚特离开了高速干道.

trans.tran_cn: 命令，许可，菲亚特汽车（意大利品牌）
trans.tran_en: an official order given by someone in a position of authority, without considering what other people want
